nodes.text: The Nest, sometimes known as the K'lor' Nest, was the district of Point Nadir that housed the rougher elements of the Outer Rim shadowport.

If a brawl or firefight were to break out on Point Nadir, the odds were good that it was in the Nest. Unlike the open spaces of the rest of the spaceport, the Nest consisted of narrow and winding corridors and alleys. It was easily the most dangerous district in the whole town, frequented by mercenaries, thugs, pirates, assassins and every form of low-life imaginable.
